title: Sister O'dell, Sand and Soul 2020, Kanye, DACA and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Sand and Soul 2020, Kanye, DACA and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today His Flyness is in Ghana and he dedicates the show to those who love attention. World Kindness Day is here and Sister O'dell has something to say about that. Sand and Soul 2020 will be bigger and badder and Big Dog's announcement is the proof. Trina was on TMZ giving her side of the Walmart incident. Could the end of DACA be near or nah? Kanye West will be in H-Town this Sunday with Joel Olsteen. Somebody spray painted "Putin's B-Word" on Trumps star in Hollywood. Today in Closing Remarks, the focal point is Kanye West, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
